nodes.label: Draw reversible and irreversible changes (ice melting vs. egg cooking)
Ice cube labeled 'ice (solid)', arrow labeled 'heat', puddle labeled 'water (liquid)', arrow labeled 'cool', solid ice again
Raw egg labeled 'raw egg', arrow labeled 'heat', cooked egg labeled 'cooked egg', arrow labeled 'cannot reverse'
Bar of chocolate transitions from 'melted chocolate' with 'heat' arrow to 'solid chocolate' with 'cool' arrow
Understanding of reversible change (ice melting and refreezing)
Understanding of reversible change (chocolate melting and solidifying)
